recipe.title: Tomato-Watermelon Soup
ingredients: 1 tablespoon red wine or sherry vinegar
1 tablespoon black olives, pitted and chopped
instructions: Blend watermelon, tomatoes, almonds, shallot, lemon juice, vinegar and oil in a food processor until smooth. Divide soup among 4 bowls and top with feta, olives and mint.
